duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide accurate data analysis and consulting services throughout the property tax cycle.
Oversee collection, preparation, review, and processing of client data.
Communicate with taxing jurisdictions and build relationships with assessors.
Drive down taxable value through various approaches to valuation and negotiation.
Meet deadlines and maintain high standards of accuracy and organization.
Think critically and communicate difficult topics with ease and simplicity.
Manage time well and prioritize tasks effectively.

education_certification.credential: College degree in Accounting, Finance, Math, Economics, Engineering, or related field (preferred)
